column3: Though it beggars belief, Tataru has somehow managed to adopt a countenance more grim than before.

A messenger from the Twin Adder visited the Waking Sands not long ago, and whatever news he bore appears to have greatly distressed Minfilia. Perhaps you should speak with her and see if your services are required.

Evidence suggests that a primal─or an entity resembling one─has been summoned in Gridania, and the Scions are duty-bound to investigate. Commander Heuloix of the Twin Adder has requested you by name, and Minfilia bids you answer his summons.
You receive a warm welcome from the High Serpent Commander, who believes you the most qualified for the task at hand. Rise to the occasion as the situation demands and press him for further details.
Speak with Minfilia in the Waking Sands.
Speak with Vorsaile Heuloix at the Adders' Nest.

A messenger from the Twin Adder came to the Waking Sands while you were in Coerthas. I wasn't privy to his conversation with the Antecedent, but she seemed terribly distressed after he took his leave.
Could it be that the Ixal have summoned Garuda again!? Or mayhap imperial forces have been sighted within the Shroud!
Well, whatever villains they may be, I know you can put a stop to their dastardly plots. You must go and see the Antecedent at once!
Pray do not tarry, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! The Antecedent needs you!
I feared this day would come once more, yet I prayed it would not be so soon.
We have reason to believe that another primal─or an entity resembling one─has been summoned in Gridania.
Blessed we are by thine timely arrival, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. The aetheric waves leave little room for doubt; thy talents will be needed in the days ahead.
If my suspicions prove true, we face an old yet familiar foe, quite unlike the Lady of the Vortex and the Dark Divinity.
We dare not draw conclusions without evidence, but as Urianger says, the readings bear a strong resemblance to ones observed more than five years ago.
And I had thought them finished with such folly...
Whatever the cause, this disturbance warrants a full investigation.
Thy presence has been requested by Commander Heuloix. He awaits thee at the Adders' Nest.
Pray hasten to Gridania, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Yda and Papalymo will rendezvous with you there. May you walk in the light of the Crystal.

We cannot ignore this aetheric disturbance, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Journey to Gridania and speak with Commander Heuloix of the Twin Adder. Yda and Papalymo will rendezvous with you anon.

A pleasure to see you as always, <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/><Else/><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Clickable(<If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Sheet(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><Sheet(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)/><Else/></If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><Sheet(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)/><Else/></If>)/> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/><Else/><Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/></If></If>.
Thank you for answering my summons. Quite frankly, I could think of no one more qualified to─ Ah, but we're getting ahead of ourselves. Allow me to explain at length.
